component.name: Raven
component.developer_name: James R. Craig and the Raven development team
component.summary: Modelling framework for simulating watershed hydrology

description.p: Raven is a robust and flexible hydrological modelling framework, designed for application to challenging hydrological problems in academia and practice. This fully object-oriented code provides complete flexibility in spatial discretization, interpolation, process representation, and forcing function generation.
